p: Candidate RNAs were serially diluted, complexed with lipofectamine 2000 using the manufacturer’s instructions, and added to white 96-well plates. BHK cells then were added to each well, and 16 to 24 h after transfection, Nano-Glo Luciferase Assay Reagent (Promega) was added to each well, and luminescence was measured.
